lines.text: And if we did get married, how would we manage? I have nothing. How would we live?
I'm sure something would come along.
Yeah. And we'd have to feed that too.
The girl, caucasian, brown hair and eyes. Height 5 -7, weight 135 pounds... extremely well distributed.
A woman can smell mink through six inches of lead.
[Finding Emile J. Keck in Johnny Dalton's bath tub]
I'm even willing to marry you.
Marry? You can't threaten me. Hello, operator? Get me the police right away!
